trusted_by_users: Amintattun masu amfani sama da {0} a duk duniya.
handpicked_tasks: Ayyuka masu yawan biyan kuɗi da aka zaɓa
how_it_works_heading: Fara samun crypto kyauta a cikin mintuna!
choose_offer_desc: Ɗauki zaɓin ku daga ayyukan da ke kan shafin da aka samu. Mun lissafa mafi kyawun tayi daga kamfanoni waɗanda ke son tallata aikace-aikacen su, safiyo, da samfuran su.
complete_offer_desc: Yawancin tayi suna da sauƙi kuma sun riga sun sami kuɗi don dubban mutane. Yawancin suna bayar da ladan farko a cikin 'yan mintuna kaɗan.
get_paid_instantly_desc: Da zarar an tabbatar, ana ƙara kuɗin ku zuwa asusunku nan take. Fitar ta hanyar Bitcoin, LiteCoin, Doge ko Dash.
what_users_say: Abin da Masu Amfani Da Mu Ke Cewa
real_earnings: Samun kuɗi na gaske daga mutane na gaske
level_up_desc: Hawan matsayi. Buɗe ladan crypto. Daga Hodler zuwa Cryptolord, zaku sami spins, haɓakawa, da ƙari.
avg_cashout_month: Matsakaici fitar da tsabar kudi ga sabbin masu amfani a wannan watan.
delete_account_confirmation_message: Ka tabbata kana son share asusunka na dindindin? Ba za a iya soke wannan aikin ba kuma za a cire duk bayananku na dindindin.
delete_account_warning: [Gargadi:] Wannan zai share duk bayanan ku har abada gami da bayanan martaba, abin da aka samu, da tarihin ciniki.

enter_your_email: Shigar da adireshin imel ɗin ku

user_info_description: Wannan widget din yana nuna ingantattun bayanan mai amfani daga whoami API. Yana sarrafa jihohin lodi ta atomatik, sarrafa kuskure, kuma ana iya haɗa shi cikin sauƙi cikin kowane allo.
compact_description: Karamin padding da kayan ado na al'ada don amfani da bargon gefe ko aljihun tebur.
custom_description: Jigon app ɗin da ya dace da gradient na al'ada.
import_widget: Shigo da Widget ɗin UserInfo a cikin shafinku ko allonku.
add_widget: Ƙara widget din zuwa bishiyar widget din tare da tsarin da ake so.
customize_styling: Keɓance salo ta amfani da kayan ado da kayan kwalliya.
handle_states: Widget din yana sarrafa lodi ta atomatik, kuskure, da jahohin wofi.
authenticated_user_details: Ingantattun bayanan mai amfani da ku
user_not_found: Ba a samo mai amfani ba
level_rewards_subtitle: Haɓaka yayin da kuke samun & buɗe sabbin lada.
level_rewards_points_description: maki 250 zuwa mataki na gaba. Kuna samun maki 1 akan kowane tsabar kudi 10 da aka samu.
reward_mystery_box_subtitle: Akwatin Sirrin Kyauta 1 Kyauta a kowane mako
reward_offer_boost_subtitle: Babu haɓaka akan tayi ko safiyo.
level_progress_description: maki 250 zuwa mataki na gaba. Kuna samun maki 1 akan kowane tsabar kudi 10 da aka samu.
profile_2fa_description: Mun lura cewa ba ku da ikon tantance abubuwa biyu. Muna ba da shawarar ku ba da damar 2FA don kiyaye amintaccen asusun ku.
profile_username_note: Za a iya canza sunan mai amfani sau ɗaya kawai a cikin kwanaki 30.
profile_interest_description: Asusunku zai sami riba 5% idan kuna da fiye da Coins 35,000. Ana biyan riba kowane mako.
security_enable_2fa_desc: Za a aika lamba zuwa imel ɗin ku duk lokacin da kuka shiga da sabuwar na'ura.
security_enable_pin_desc: Kuna buƙatar shigar da lambar fil mai lamba 4 lokacin tabbatar da ayyuka masu mahimmanci.
security_2fa_app_desc: Ka'idodin tabbatar da abubuwa biyu suna ƙara ƙarin tsaro a asusunku. Lokacin da ka shiga sabuwar na'ura dole ne ka shigar da lambar lambobi 6 mai mahimmancin lokaci.
2fa_unknown_device_subtitle: Mun lura kana shiga daga wata na'urar da ba a sani ba.
2fa_instruction: Da fatan za a shigar da lambar tsaro daga ƙa'idar mai tabbatar da ku.
2fa_support_text: Idan baku da lambar tsaro, don Allah
security_verification_required: Da fatan za a kammala tabbatar da tsaro
turnstile_required: Da fatan za a kammala tabbatar da tsaro
turnstile_token_missing: Alamar tabbatar da tsaro ta ɓace. Da fatan za a sake gwadawa.
2fa_dialog_body_text: Yin amfani da ƙa'idar tabbatarwa kamar Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, Authy, ko 1Password, bincika lambar QR. Zai samar muku da lambar lamba 6 don shigar da ku a ƙasa.
2fa_dialog_note_text: Idan kuna fuskantar matsala ta amfani da lambar QR, zaɓi shigarwar hannu akan app ɗin ku, sannan shigar da sunan mai amfani da lambar:
setup_2fa_instructions: Saita ingantaccen abu biyu don amintar da asusunku
please_wait: Da fatan za a jira yayin da muke tabbatar da lambar ku...
2fa_enabled_desc: Asusunka yana da kariya ta hanyar tantance abubuwa biyu. Za ka buƙaci shigar da lambar lambobi 4 lokacin shiga daga sabbin na'urori.
2fa_disabled_desc: Kunna tantance abubuwa biyu don ƙara ƙarin tsaro ga asusunka. Za ka buƙaci shigar da lambar lambobi 4 masu saurin fahimta lokacin shiga.
2fa_initial_desc: Bincika halin tabbatar da abubuwa biyu don ganin idan an kiyaye asusun ku tare da ƙarin tsaro.
check_2fa_status_description: Bincika matsayin ku na 2FA don ganin ko an kare asusun ku
disable_2fa_warning_message: Kashe ingantaccen abu biyu zai sa asusunka ya zama mara tsaro. Kun tabbata kuna son ci gaba?
disable_2fa_security_note: Za a kiyaye asusun ku ta kalmar sirri kawai.
2fa_disabled_successfully: An yi nasarar kashe 2FA don asusun ku.
2fa_login_verification_subtitle: Shigar da lambar lambobi 4 daga manhajar tantancewa don kammala shiga.
2fa_login_info: Bude app ɗin ku don samun lambar.
2fa_code_must_be_6_digits: Lambar 2FA dole ne ta zama lambobi 6
welcome_description:
Kammala wannan ɗan gajeren koyawa don kyauta na maraba na musamman.

Zai ɗauki minti ɗaya kawai!
free_spins_description:
Kowace rana ko mako da kuka shiga, za a ba wa asusun ku kyauta kullum 'Free Spins' da kuma 'Asirin Kwalaye' na mako-mako.

Lambar da kuke karɓa ya dogara da matakin asusun ku.
daily_streak_description:
Kowace rana ka shiga kuma ka sami mafi ƙarancin adadin tsabar kudi, za ka iya yin iƙirarin adadin yau da kullun.

Yawan kwanakin da kuka yi da'awar zaren ku, mafi girman lada!

Matakan asusu mafi girma kuma suna samun manyan lada.
ptc_ads_description:
Duba Tallace-tallacen PTC don sauri, gajerun tallace-tallace don haɓaka jimlar kuɗin ku na yau da kullun.

Tallan zai buɗe a cikin sabon shafin, don haka tabbatar yana buɗewa har sai lokacin da aka gama!
missions_description:
Za ku sami ɗaruruwan manufa da buƙatun da za a kammala a cikin sashin 'Misions' na gidan yanar gizon.

Kammala ayyuka da nema hanya ce mai kyau don samun kari Coins.

Duba shafin Sami → 'Kyaukan Bugawa' don cikakkun bayanai.
offers_description:
Kammala tayin shine ɗayan mafi kyawun hanyoyin samun tsabar kudi akan GigaFaucet.

Ana iya samun tayin a sashin 'Sami' na gidan yanar gizon.

Akwai nau'ikan tayi daban-daban da yawa akwai. Tabbatar duba su don waɗanda suka fi dacewa da ku.
xp_description:
Duk lokacin da kuka kammala tayin, kunna mai ninka, ko kallon bidiyo, da sauransu, zaku sami XP (Kwarewar Ƙwarewa).

Samun XP zai haɓaka asusun ku, buɗe ƙarin fasali da ƙarin lada.

Kuna iya nemo matakin asusun ku akan Fayil ɗin ku ko shafin kari.
withdraw_description:
Kuna iya cire tsabar kuɗin ku da zarar kun buga mafi ƙarancin tsabar kudi 30,000.

Don cirewa, je zuwa Account → 'Cash Out' kuma zaɓi hanyar cirewa da kuka fi so.

Bi umarnin don kammala janyewar ku.
all_set_description:
Yanzu kun shirya don fara samun tsabar kudi akan GigaFaucet!

Ka tuna don duba kullun yau da kullun don juzu'in kari da akwatunan asiri, da kammala tayi da manufa don haɓaka abin da kuka samu.

Sa'a da jin daɗi!
tutorial_reward_desc: Da'awar 3 Bonus Spins da Akwatunan Sirri 2
failed_to_load_privacy_policy: An kasa Load da Dokar Sirri
profile_update_success: An sabunta bayanin martaba cikin nasara!
referrals_manage_desc: Raba GigaFaucet tare da abokanka da dangin ku don samun kusan 25% akan kowane mai magana.
referrals_manage_help: Idan kuna da wasu tambayoyi, da fatan za a ziyarci Shafin Taimako na mu.
referrals_link_desc: Raba hanyar haɗin yanar gizon ku akan kafofin watsa labarun, shafukan yanar gizo, ko gidajen yanar gizo na PTC da sauransu. Duk masu amfani da suka yi rajista ta hanyar haɗin yanar gizon ku za su sami kuɗin kuɗi!
referrals_leaderboard_desc: Ana sabunta allon jagora kowane minti 15.
referrals_details_desc: Gasar turawa tana gudana kowane wata kuma ana biya a ƙarshen kowane wata. Sami shigarwar ga kowane mai amfani da aka ambata.
referrals_users_desc: Duba masu amfani da kuka koma zuwa GigaFaucet
referral_get_started_desc: Kawai koma masu amfani zuwa GigaFaucet ta amfani da hanyar haɗin kai na al'ada. Za a bin diddigin su ta atomatik kuma a danganta su zuwa gare ku idan sun yi rajista kowane lokaci a cikin kwanaki 30.
referral_point_1: Za ku sami kashi 25% na duk buƙatun buɗaɗɗen famfo DON RAYUWA.
referral_point_2: Hakanan za ku sami kashi 10% na duk wani abin da kuka bayar na samun kuɗin bango.
referral_point_3: Babu iyaka ga adadin masu aikawa da za ku iya aikawa.
referral_point_4: Ba a yarda da shawarwari kan na'ura ɗaya ko a cikin gida ɗaya ba kuma ba za a ƙidaya su azaman masu ba da izini ba.
referral_warning: MUHIMMI: Ba za a kirga ba, na karya ko kwafi. Ana iya dakatar da asusun ku kuma duk tsabar kudi an rasa idan an same ku kuna aikawa da bayanan da ba su da inganci.
referral_banner_note: Danna don kwafin lambar kuma yi amfani da waɗannan banners akan gidan yanar gizonku ko bulogi don jawo hankalin masu magana.
referral_get_started_warning: MUHIMMI: Ba za a kirga ba, na karya ko kwafi. Ana iya dakatar da asusun ku kuma duk tsabar kudi an rasa idan an same ku kuna aikawa da bayanan da ba su da inganci. Muna da matakan sarrafawa ta atomatik don ganowa da hana abubuwan da ba su da inganci. An yi muku gargaɗi.
